com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.function

Interface Function<T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of value to transform; typically the matched object
    R - type of the target value to transform to

    public interface Function<T,R>

    Anticipated function from Java 8+/Guava used in Hamcrest context to access an aspect of the matched object for comparison.

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R apply(T input)
      Applies this function to the given argument.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        Applies this function to the given argument.
        Parameters:
        input - the function argument
        Returns:
        the function result
        Since:
        0.1.0
